name: Haunted wall
description:
The goal is to merge with 23 will-o'-the-wisps in the lowest time possible.

Left click  or space to merge with a  will-o'-the-wisp of your color. You and the  will-o'-the-wisp will merge and kill all enemies in your path. The enemies killed will drop will-o'-the-wisp(s). 

Right click or Alt to dash to your mouse, killing all enemies in your path. It will cost you one will-o'-the-wisp.

A color blind mode is available in the settings.

Mobile controls : 

One touch to move, second touch to dash. Touch the arrow pointing to a will-o'-the-wisp to merge with it.

The cloud based leaderboard only works in the windows dowloadable version. 

We hope you will like it ;). 

Enjoy!

Art, audio and  development :

Vyndicta

Boromp

Made for the ScoreSpace Jam #14, using for http://dreamlo.com the leaderboard.
